author: orlikowski
msg: As in the case of 1.3, there are expected cases where this should not
return a port (i.e. a uri beginning with /). Thus, we keep the
default case fast, and let module authors check back on the port being

author: orlikowski
msg: *Sigh.* Taking tjis back out *again,* to keep things fast in the default case.
This appears not to be expected to return the port in all cases; module
authors should not expect this to be the case.

author: orlikowski
msg: Backing my earlier change out; There exists the possibility for
ap_parse_uri_components to not fill in the port field in certain cases,
i.e. wherein the uri begins with /
